title: xxxHolic, Vol. 16
description: The witch Yûko is gone, vanished and forgotten by the world with the exception of a small handful of people. But Kimihiro is determined to keep the wish-granting shop going, even if the shop’s arcane rules nearly kill him for the crime of setting a wrong price. Now begins a new xxxHOLiC Rô! xxxHOLiC crosses over with Tsubasa, also by CLAMP. Don’t miss it! Available on DVD from FUNimation Entertainment Includes special extras after the story!
author: Clamp
